findings.title: PTAI - Potential Transfer Amount Inconsistency
findings.description: The `transfer()` and `transferFrom()` functions may produce inconsistency between the expected and actual transferred amount due to ERC20 transfer tax.

findings.title: TSI - Tokens Sufficiency Insurance
findings.description: The tokens are not held within the contract itself, instead relying on an external administrator, which introduces dependency and centralization risks.

findings.title: OCTD - Transfers Contract's Tokens
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to claim all the balance of the contract by calling the `depositToVault` function.

findings.title: MEM - Misleading Error Messages
findings.description: The contract is not using error messages in revert statements, making it difficult to identify and fix issues.

findings.title: RRC - Redundant Require Condition
findings.description: The `require` statement checking if `stakingIdx` is less than `stakings.length` is redundant and can be safely removed without impacting the security or functionality of the contract.
